name: rishiqing-electron
author: 北京创仕科锐信息技术有限责任公司
CompanyName: 北京创仕科锐信息技术有限责任公司

scripts.build-mac-beta: vue-cli-service build && node copy.js --env=beta && cross-env CHANNEL=beta ARCH=x64 node electron-builder.js
scripts.build-mac-release: vue-cli-service build && node copy.js --env=release && cross-env CHANNEL=release ARCH=x64 node electron-builder.js
scripts.build-ia32-beta: vue-cli-service build && node copy.js --env=beta && cross-env CHANNEL=beta ARCH=ia32 node electron-builder.js
scripts.build-ia32-release: vue-cli-service build && node copy.js --env=release && cross-env CHANNEL=release ARCH=ia32 node electron-builder.js
scripts.build-x64-beta: vue-cli-service build && node copy.js --env=beta && cross-env CHANNEL=beta ARCH=x64 node electron-builder.js
scripts.build-x64-release: vue-cli-service build && node copy.js --env=release && cross-env CHANNEL=release ARCH=x64 node electron-builder.js
